attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are calls to curb the BBC website as it is too popular and powerful. We call to leave the BBC web site exactly as it is. The BBC website it is a fantastic world wide resource for news, sport and other activities. The News section is by far the best in the world and gives unbiased reports to a very high standard. There is no reason to have it curbed. Leave the BBC website alone!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
